credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Border
description: Mechlin-style border with a repeated design of a bird perched on a branch with a turned head. Design interspersed with elaborate diagonal scroll work. Fond: shorter Droschel. Modes: venises, portes, St. Esprit avec rangs clairs, fond de neige, amures.
name: Border
